preqs: Script Development 1 (ATS2890) or two gateway units in Theatre

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS1287, ATS1288} or  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2890})

description: This unit builds upon skills developed in Script Development 1. It explores specific applications of script development such as writing for the stage, writing a monologue, writing for television, writing for radio etc.  Students gain experience in the finalisation of a script and its presentation for publication, performance and recording.  By the end of the unit students will have produced a script at a professional level able to be  considered for production, broadcast or assessed for grant support.
